author: dreiss
msg: We don't want to include pthread.h in Mutex.h, so we can't detect whether
the non-portable mutex initializers are defined.  Instead, we just declare
them unconditionally and only define them if they are available.
Unfortunately, this means that users will get a link error instead of a
compile error if they try to use them when they are not available.

author: dreiss
msg: Regenerate reflection_limited to pick up some compiler improvements.

author: dreiss
msg: Eliminate some trailing whitespace from the generated Python code.

author: dreiss
msg: Include limits.h in the compiler for PATH_MAX
